name: Captain Canary's Crash Landing Calamity
description:
Story

Captain Canary, daring adventurer, is on a delivery mission in enemy territory. Will they manage to pass fields of wreckage and squadrons of enemy fighters unscathed?

…

No. No, they won’t. An ambush. Drats.

 

Controls

Arrow Keys / WASD / D-Pad
steer, manouver in the air

Spacebar / Enter / Controller Button      
open hatch, jump out, pull back in

Escape / Start                                             
pause

 

How to play

There are instructions in-game!

Also, as you can see, out of game.

 

Credits

bastilo - very wise owl

purrseus - colorful, silly songbird 

Changelog

Version 1.1 (2021-10-05)
  • added touchscreen support
  • various animation fixes
Version 1.0 (2021-10-05)
  • initial release (Ludum Dare release)

Have a fish! 🐟
